page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: There are three chapels in our area, one of which is not in use any more. This chapel is now a private residence called 'Gothic View'. The Methodist chapel is on the B3399 road near Gotten Manor Farm.The present Reverend of this chapel is Rev.E.Dudley Jenkins who resides at Connaught Road,East Cowes.(Isle of Wight).It is believed to be haunted by a woman in white who only comes out on certain days at midnight.She is supposed to walk from the old part of the church to the new part,then to the vestry where she disappears.There is also believed to be a spectre that looks at you if you are on your own. The third chapel is in Roud near the track of the old railway.
